ul_527014: seven_days=$(date -d '7 days ago' '+%s')
stat -c "%Y %%n" /folder/folder1/*/ | sort -nr | tail -n +20 | while read -r mtime name; do
    if (( mtime < seven_days )); then
        echo "remove directory $name"
    fi
done
